name: Sonic Aquarius Force
description:
Sonic Aquarius Force

 Date: September 25th 2019

A Greek Based Region Sonic Fan Game!

Control

Arrow To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Enter To Change Character

Story/Plot

A Month Ago,Dr.Robotnik Begin To Go To Find This Greek Region Called The Land Of Aquarius.

Dr.Robotnik Fly There And See The People Was Planting There Plant In Their Garden Until Dr.Robotnik Began To Hack The System And Bring Water To The Land.

Now That The Land Is Full Of Water But Now,Sonic Was Taking a Vacation Without Tails and Tails is All Home Alone In The House.

Sonic Drive To The Airport And See His Friend Mighty And Ray and He Was A Glad to See Them.

After A Couple Of Hour At The Airport Sonic And Mighty Enter The Airplane and They End Up In The Land Of Aquarius and Saw The Mountain.

But Ray Just Realized The Region is Full Of Water And Sonic Think Dr.Robotnik Did It.

When Arrived There Sonic And The Gang Find Out What Going On Around In This Region.

It Up To Sonic, Mighty And Ray Change The Land Back To Normal And Stop Dr. Robotnik.

Click On Download Button To Play The Game!
